mapper.select: select * from hm_group g where g.id = #{id}

select g1.* from hm_group g1 inner join hm_group g2 on g1.groupId = g2.id where g1.passportId is null and g1.type = #{type} and g1.hierarchy = 2
order by g2.level, g1.level,g1.id desc
select g.* from hm_group g where g.passportId is null and g.type = #{type} and g.groupId = 0
select g.* from hm_group g where g.passportId is null and g.type = #{type} order by g.hierarchy
select g.* from hm_group g where g.passportId is null and g.type = #{type} and (g.uploadType = #{uploadType} or g.uploadType = 0) order by g.hierarchy,g.groupId,g.id
